passage_1: this is not the undisputed worst boxing movie ever , but it's certainly not a champion - the big loser is the audience .
passage_2: this is not the undisputed worst boxing movie ever , but it's assuredly not a champion - the big loser is the audience .

passage_1: watching it is rather like an overlong visit from a large group of your relatives . as your relatives swap one mundane story after another , you begin to wonder if they are ever going to depart .
